hero.heading_en: Top Cyber Security Company in Saudi Arabia
hero.heading_ar: شركة الأمن السيبراني الرائدة في المملكة العربية السعودية
hero.description: ETQAA is the leading cybersecurity company in Saudi Arabia specializing in protecting organizations from sophisticated cyber threats. We provide comprehensive solutions including risk assessment, penetration testing, incident response, vulnerability management, and compliance with national and international standards. Our team of certified experts ensures your data and infrastructure are protected with the latest technologies and methodologies.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive security solutions to protect your digital assets and ensure business continuity

penetration-testing.title: Penetration Testing
penetration-testing.desc: Identify vulnerabilities before attackers do through professional penetration testing.
penetration-testing.longDesc: Our Penetration Testing services simulate real-world attacks to identify security vulnerabilities in your systems. We use advanced penetration testing methodologies and provide detailed reports and actionable recommendations to improve your security posture and protect your sensitive data from potential risks.

vulnerability-assessment.title: Vulnerability Assessment
vulnerability-assessment.desc: Identify and address vulnerabilities in your IT environment.
vulnerability-assessment.longDesc: Our Vulnerability Assessment services systematically evaluate your IT environment to detect security vulnerabilities. We provide detailed reports and remediation guidance to improve your security posture and reduce potential risks to your technology infrastructure.

risk-assessment.title: Risk Assessment
risk-assessment.desc: Identify, evaluate, and mitigate risks threatening your business.
risk-assessment.longDesc: Our Risk Assessment services help organizations identify and evaluate security risks threatening their business. We provide detailed analysis and recommendations for risk mitigation strategies, enabling you to make informed decisions to protect your valuable assets and ensure business continuity.

grc-service.title: GRC Services
grc-service.desc: Governance, Risk, and Compliance solutions tailored to your business needs.
grc-service.longDesc: Our Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC) solutions help organizations align security with business objectives while maintaining compliance with regulatory requirements. We provide comprehensive frameworks for effectively managing governance, risk, and compliance, helping you balance innovation and security in the evolving digital business landscape.

ics-scada-testing.title: ICS/SCADA Testing
ics-scada-testing.desc: Test the security of Industrial Control Systems and SCADA systems to protect critical infrastructure.
ics-scada-testing.longDesc: Our Industrial Control Systems (ICS) and SCADA penetration testing services provide specialized security assessment in sensitive operational environments. We identify vulnerabilities in industrial control systems with consideration for the unique requirements of critical infrastructure, helping to protect industrial operations from sophisticated cyber threats.

configuration-review.title: Configuration Review
configuration-review.desc: Review and improve security settings in your systems and infrastructure.
configuration-review.longDesc: Our Configuration Review service provides a comprehensive assessment of security settings in your systems and infrastructure. We identify configuration errors and potential vulnerabilities and provide specific recommendations to enhance your security posture according to industry best practices and security standards.

secure-code-review.title: Secure Code Review
secure-code-review.desc: Identify and fix security vulnerabilities in code before deployment.
secure-code-review.longDesc: Our Secure Code Review service provides comprehensive analysis of code to detect security vulnerabilities early in the development lifecycle. Our experts identify potential security issues in source code and provide specific remediation guidance, helping to develop secure applications and reduce the cost of addressing security issues in later stages.

red-teaming.title: Red Teaming
red-teaming.desc: Simulate sophisticated attacks to test your organization's defenses.
red-teaming.longDesc: Our Red Team exercises simulate sophisticated real-world attacks to test your organization's detection and response capabilities. We use advanced techniques and methodologies similar to those used by real attackers to evaluate the effectiveness of your security controls and provide valuable insights and recommendations for improvement.

social-engineering.title: Social Engineering
social-engineering.desc: Test your employees' cybersecurity awareness and resistance to social engineering techniques.
social-engineering.longDesc: Our Social Engineering services test your employees' ability to recognize and appropriately respond to fraud and manipulation attempts. We implement realistic scenarios such as phishing, phone calls, and physical access to assess the level of security awareness in your organization and identify areas for improvement in security awareness programs.

about.title: About ETQAA
about.subtitle: A leading Saudi cybersecurity firm dedicated to providing high-quality services to government entities and businesses.
about.intro: We specialize in delivering tailored solutions that protect sensitive data and uphold national interests in today's digital age. Our expert team leverages cutting-edge technologies to ensure client security, covering threat detection, risk management, and compliance.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: In an increasingly complex digital landscape, ETQAA's mission is to enhance organizational resilience and secure critical assets against evolving cyber threats. We take a holistic approach, integrating governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) frameworks, security assessments, and operational support to safeguard our clients' digital frontiers.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: At ETQAA, we strive to be the trusted partner for cybersecurity in Saudi Arabia, protecting organizations across sectors through innovative solutions, expert insights, and a commitment to excellence.

Scop.title: Our Scope of Services
items: Comprehensive Security Assessment and Vulnerability Management
Advanced Threat Detection and Incident Response
Penetration Testing and Red Team Operations
